channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: A collection of notes about learning Thai language.

item.title: On the table
item.description: There are a lot of stuff on a table … but how to say that in Thai?

item.title: Welcome to My Thai Notes
item.description: This blog intend to keep track of what I’m doing daily to improve my Thai but instead of using a note system which will be local and only for me I decided to use the blog format to share my notes with the world.
